author: Woo Bih Li J:
casename: Master Contract Services Pte Ltd v Sevugan Kalyanasundaram
counsel: Edwin Lee (Rajah and Tann) for the applicant; Seeni Syed Ahamed Kabeer (Syed Yahya and Partners) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Employment Law/Application to vary assessment of compensation for permanent total incapacity by Commissioner of Labour/Whether additional compensation under Third Schedule para 2(3) subject to maximum amount of compensation under para 2(2)/Third Schedule paras 2(1), 2(2), 2(3) Workmen's Compensation Act (Cap 354, 1998 Rev Ed)
